ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
2 (8 ounce) containers whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®)
30 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), crushed

cookingTips: Fold in whipped topping in two additions for even distribution
Add cookies just before serving to maintain crunch
Chill for at least 30 minutes to let flavors meld
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in assembling a simple crowd-pleasing dessert where texture contrasts between fluffy and crunchy elements are preserved.
